Die Japanische Sprachen has literally no strong language, can it be "the civilized language"? Not in a F------ Million Years!
Any language can be "Uncivil", just like Mandalorian, they have the worst words in the world: Knee-Maher SL, and many more. These words are the same as The Seven Words in the Trumpish Language, which include Covfefe, Hamberder, Hustory, Carona, smocking gun, highjack and infantroopen. In fact, almost a lot of languages have their vocabulary of Strong Language, but that doesn't mean a language is "Uncivil".
